Package at.easydiet.dao

This package contains the DAO objects, to create Hibernate models.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CheckOperatorDAO A DAO implementation for CheckOperator objects.

DAOFactory A Factory which provides instances for all DAOs.

GenderDAO A DAO implementation for Gender objects.

Package at.easydiet.dao Description

This package contains the DAO objects, to create Hibernate models.
